title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-7.5 - Test conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-7.5 - Test conditions

State Regulations
(a) Ambient condition. Tests shall be conducted under ambient conditions. In the
case of a dispute, tests shall be conducted under conditions of 65 percent
maximum relative humidity and a temperature of 70° +- 2° F, and
specimens shall be in moisture equilibrium under the above
conditions. (b) Draft. Tests shall
be conducted in a draft-free environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-7.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
